about_the_game:
Dive into the enthralling fantasy adventure "Christmas Fables: The Magic Snowflake DLC"! Get ready for mini-games, puzzles, and a treasure trove of hidden objects! Explore additional content across four new exciting locations: venture down the rabbit hole, peruse the shop of wonders, investigate Everette's office, and explore the toy warehouse where intriguing discoveries await.

In the new locations, uncover fresh insights about the characters and unravel all the mysteries that will clarify the entire scenario. Earn new achievements by completing all the quests!

🎄 EXPLORE THE RABBIT HOLE!
Have you ever glimpsed a rabbit hole and wondered what lies beneath? Congratulations, you're about to find out! Get ready to encounter the magical rabbits!

🎄 VISIT THE SHOP OF WONDERS!
A fortune-telling ball, a magic piano, figurines and colorful pebbles - all these things can be found in the shop of wonders. You'll have to examine everything carefully to find even the slightest clue!

🎄 TAKE A LOOK AROUND EVERETT'S STUDY!
Huge shelves with thick volumes of books dusted on them, a desk that is covered with a cloth, apparently covering it from prying eyes... Solve all the puzzles and find hidden objects in Everette's study!

🎄 COME TO THE TOY WAREHOUSE!
Among the fabric books, eyes, plastic spouts and fittings you might find something very interesting. It's up to you to pay a visit there and find out exactly what the place is hiding!

Are you ready for a magical journey filled with hidden objects and puzzles that will leave you spellbound?

short_description: A magical snowflake has fallen into the hands of a little troublemaker! Save Christmas and find the magic artifact!

*languages with full audio support
